column5: Just incase some of you dont have the World Fishing Network and are on Rogers Digital Cable ...  I just saw a commercial for WFN(channel 424 i believe) ... Rogers is offering it free till August 24th..
Ch 426  First time seeing the Redfish tournaments, they look like a blast.
im a subscriber.. mine doesnt work half the damn time! keep getting a "this channel is currently not available" message. bah!
who on OFC doesnt have WFN ??? madness !  WFN and WILDTV are on 90% at my house
Cogeco in Hamilton STILL doesn't offer it until they complete their digital upgrades within the next year.  AAAAARGH!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Sure they do, it was free last week for seven days. I'm downtown with Cogeco, not sure about the Mountain.
Has anybody seen this show called the lodge on WFN?? Thats a good looking girl right there managing it bom chicka wah wah lol.
lol theres a few there marko. alot of good lookin guide ladies. i remember my dad drawing it to my attention when watching it and saying "pogledaj tu GUZU!!"  LOL!
Great, my nas GF walked by and happened to read just that.  Now I'm in the doghouse.  Thanks
My wife and daughters voted against it
I'm in the east end and believe me, they don't.  I talked with one of their Reps on the phone a couple days ago and he told me no WFN until they complete their upgrades.
